Hello World!

1. Setup

Let's add the first file. Create `index.html` in the root with the following content.

2. Liquid

Use Liquid to change "Hello World!" to lowercase. But initially, this does not work, since we did not add front matter yet.

hello world!

Add "front matter" to the top of this page, i.e. `index.html` file. This time we can see the lowercase of "HELLO WORLD!"

hello world!
